lead_paragraph: In the late 1960's, in the bleak industrial landscape of the North of England, two young men are forever changed by Northern Soul, a musical and cultural movement fueled by insistent rhythm and raw emotion, that saw the tail-end of Mod delve ever-deeper into black American Soul music.
